body.Subject: New Teams Call Queue Request - @{triggerBody()?['RequestID']}
body.Body:
Hi,

Your request for a new MS Teams Call Queue has been fulfilled. Your new Call Queue is called:

@{triggerBody()?['CQName']}

The Phone Number of your Queue is:

@{body('Extract_Resource_and_CQ_ID')?['TelephoneNumber']}


Please note, you will need to wait 12 hours if you need to amend any settings of your Call Queue via the app. However you can update the list of Call Queue members at any point from now on.

Thanks,

The Voice and Video Team

body.Subject: Teams Call Queue Request Failure
body.Body:
This email is to notify that a request for a new Teams Call Queue has failed to complete.

Please log onto Azure to check for errors in the Runbook.

Job ID: @{body('Create_Call_Queue_-_Welcome')?['properties']?['jobId']}
Request ID: @{body('Create_Call_Queue_-_Welcome')?['id']}
Start Time: @{body('Create_Call_Queue_-_Welcome')?['properties']?['startTime']}

The request was for a Call Queue with Welcome Text but NO Overflow or Timeout text
